title: Severe Diesel Shortage reported island wide
content: A severe shortage of Diesel has been reported within Sri Lanka during the weekend. Sri Lanka Fuel Distributors Association stated that diesel supply being diverted for use in power plants and stockpiling by consumers has caused an island-wide diesel shortage.Speaking to media on Sunday (27), Gemunu Wijeratne, Chairman of the Private Bus Owners Association said that bus services will be restricted from tomorrow (28) due to the shortage of fuel.
